com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Class PolylineIntersectionSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb.PolylineIntersectionSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VertexSearch

    public final class PolylineIntersectionSearch
extends Object
implements VertexSearch
    Objects of this class can find the intersection between a line segment and a Polyline.

    The result() is returned as a Vertex with the provided intersectionColor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolylineIntersectionSearch(Vector2 p0, Vector2 p1, Polyline polyline, Color intersectionColor)
      Creates a new PolylineIntersectionSearch object, by providing the line segment, polyline and intersectionColor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Vertex result()
      Returns the Vertex found by this VertexSearch.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolylineIntersectionSearch

        public PolylineIntersectionSearch(Vector2 p0,
                                  Vector2 p1,
                                  Polyline polyline,
                                  Color intersectionColor)
        Creates a new PolylineIntersectionSearch object, by providing the line segment, polyline and intersectionColor.
        Parameters:
        p0 - the first line segment boundary
        p1 - the second line segment boundary
        polyline - the Polyline to check for the intersection with the p0-p1 line segment
        intersectionColor - the Color of the Vertex returned by result(), if there is an intersection

    • Method Detail

      • result

        public Vertex result()
        Returns the Vertex found by this VertexSearch.

        The result is the intersection point between line segment p0-p1 and polyline.

        The color() of the Vertex returned is equal to intersectionColor.

        If line segment p0-p1 is simply connected to polyline through one of its bounds, there is no intersection.

        Specified by:
        result in interface VertexSearch
        Returns:
        the intersection Vertex between line segment p0-p1 and polyline; if the intersection is not found, and new instance of VoidVertex is returned
